name: SoapBoy
description:
With no one else to turn to, the General reaches out..
..to our only hope..

..Soapboy!

This is a Ludum Dare 46 Compo submission for the theme
Keep It Alive

-Controls Keyboard-

1      - Shoot
Space  - Jump
Arrows - Move

-Controls XBox-

X - Shoot
A - Jump
Directional Pad - Move

-Controls PS-

Square  - Shoot
X - Jump
Directional Pad - Move

-Issues that I am aware of-
If there are any flickering going on in full screen, I am unaware on how to fix this,
and it seems to be a Pixel Game Maker MV issue

My take on the theme was to make light of our current situation,
so I made a game where you play as Soapboy and fight zombies and
evil bacteria!

Made in Pixel Game Maker MV!

Obviously with the 48 hours I couldn't quite fit everything I wanted
in the game, however I did the best I could, and hope you enjoy it all the same.

Depending on skill, I'd say it takes about 5-10 minutes to complete what is 
essentially a level 1!
